message: Meet in the middle, no need for haggling!
You can't resist a good deal, can you?
You're getting closer, but not quite there!
Getting closer, but I'm not giving in yet!
Time's running out, let's make a deal!
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to back down!
Last chance, Bob. Don't let inflation ruin us both!
I'm not going to leave with nothing, Alice!
Last chance, Bob. Meet me in the middle, for what's left of the money!
